content: Is this for real? I guess even a deep supervillain looks two dimensional when brought into the light of our ordinary reality. Hopefully the kids will look back on this later as a cool thing that freaked them out at the time. Their first bad trip in a way. They got a performance from a famous actor who risked arrest in a failed attempt to brighten their day. Maybe he knew it would be too much for the truly serious conditions. I would have loved that at age 9, not so sure about 6. Either way this made me laugh out loud, thanks!
